name: ft_transcendence
desc:
Web development project for 42. The goal is to create an online multiplayer Pong with features such as:

       -auth (email) and OAuth2 42
       -Chat (private and channel)
       -Matchmaking (ranked, un-ranked, custom appearance...)
       -User profile (player stats, add friend, block user...)
       -Live information (users connected, friend status ... )

Website build in Single Page Application.

name: deezy
desc:
Deezy is a small web project using the Deezer api with the following functionality:

       -OAuth2 Deezer
       -Trending song display
       -Search for any sound via the deezer api
       -Single page for each sound, with the option of listening to a preview

Website build with Angular + Express + MangoDB host on OVH VPS.

name: portfolio_3d
desc: Rebuilding my portfolio in 3D using ThreeJs. Built in NextJS (React) TypeScript.

name: first_website
desc:
First website made in html css and JavaScript with features such as :

       -Flappy bird game
       -Weather api tools
       -so_long 42 project
       -...
